scripts.test:ci: docker compose up -d && ( [ $(sleep 1; docker compose ps -q|wc -l) -gt 1 ] || (echo Could not start docker containers; docker compose down; exit 1) ) && TEST_MODE=current FULL_TEST_SUPPORT=true vitest run; RESULT=$?; docker compose down; exit $RESULT
scripts.test: echo 'Running tests only for the current version' && export TEST_MODE=current-version && rushx test:with-docker
scripts.test:quicktest: echo 'Running tests only for the current version' && export TEST_MODE=current-version && rushx test:no-docker
scripts.test:all-versions: echo 'Running tests for all versions' && rushx test:with-docker
scripts.test:all-versions:quicktest: echo 'Running tests for all versions' && rushx test:no-docker
scripts.test:no-docker: echo 'Running unit tests without docker support' && vitest --ui
scripts.test:with-docker: echo 'Running tests with full docker support' && docker compose up -d && FULL_TEST_SUPPORT=true vitest --ui; docker compose down
